G

generateFileName(String) - Method in class DownloadHtml
Method which produces a random file name which has this format: x000000000 (x: random alphabet letter, 0: random digit 0-9).
getConnectionData() - Static method in class DataBaseConn
This method's purpose is to ask the user of this app all the necessary information such as the Local database path or the log-in data in order to perform a connection to the database.
getDatabasePath() - Static method in class DataBaseConn
Method which helps to get (in a graphic way) the right database path using regular expressions to check the path and if-else blocks to handle any possible errors.
getLink() - Static method in class DataBaseConn
 
getLinks() - Method in class LinksEx
 
getLinksPerPage() - Method in class Crawl
Method which asks for the user (in a graphic way) to enter the links he want per html page.
getPassword() - Static method in class DataBaseConn
Method which helps to get (in a graphic way) the password of the user using if-else blocks to handle any possible errors.
getPath() - Static method in class DataBaseConn
 
getTableName() - Static method in class DataBaseConn
Method which helps to get (in a graphic way) the table's name using if-else blocks to handle any possible errors.
getUsername() - Static method in class DataBaseConn
Method which helps to get (in a graphic way) the username of the user using if-else blocks to handle any possible errors.
getWaitingTime() - Method in class Crawl
Method which asks for the user (in a graphic way) to enter the time which is willing to wait.
